reset() - Method in class fotoshop.GUI.MenuBar.FilterPanel_Rotate
 
ResourceManager - Class in fotoshop.resources
ResourceManager simply contains methods used for obtaining resources for textual and other language dependant data.
ResourceManager() - Constructor for class fotoshop.resources.ResourceManager
 
RotateFilter - Class in fotoshop.Filter
Derived from the suggestions made in "Objects First with Java" by Michael Kolling and David Barnes, along with the methods used originally within the Editor class of the prototype Fotoshop project.
RotateFilter(String) - Constructor for class fotoshop.Filter.RotateFilter
Initialise the RotateFilter.
